wiki.content:
The song is about a school shooter.

wiki.summary: The song is about a school shooter.

track.name: Valentine's Day
comments: "songs that sound like they're about a holiday, but aren't".< lmao
Tagged as "songs that sound like they're about a holiday, but aren't".
Love zoning out of reality to this song
great video, always nice to see David again
The alien became man at last. :,-)
Beautiful... and chilling, once you realize what the song is about.

Awesome song! 
When he sings 'the teachers and the football star' reminds me of something very specific, but I can't place it. Anyone has any idea?
It's like I've already heard the song many times before, don't know how good that is, but it does sound like an instant classic.
